name: Hexagon Islands
description:
Build up your continent to get a higher score!

Windows version is recommended for better framerate and proper fullscreen.

________________________________________________________________________________

How To Play

WASD  or Arrow Keys to Move

Left Click and drag islands to add it to your land and kill nearby enemies

Right click to push enemies away


Gain extra points for every connected edge
